creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: stylized image of a female figure with long dark hair, gray and white striped dress and orange skin; holds white comb with PL hand, and small gray hand mirror in PR hand; bare leg, bent, with exposed toes in LRC
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
signed: LLC in pencil: 浅野竹二 {Asano Takeji}; LRC in pencil: T. Asano
title: Woman Combing Her Hair
